article_title: Rubio, Sanders and Kasich respond to Ohio newspaper questions about economy

article_metadata.description: Candidates for president were asked to respond to a question about the Ohio economy by the Ohio Newspaper Organization. The candidates were informed of a consortium formed by The Repository, Columbus Dispatch, Akron Beacon Journal, Dayton Daily News, Cincinnati Enquirer, Toledo Blade, Ohio Public Radio and television stations in Dayton and Columbus. Three responded by the deadline. Here are their answers.
